ValidationRule.description: When the Case Origin is 'On-Site Visit' on HRS HRBP Case Record Type cases, then Client Summary must be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'HRS HRBP Case Record Type', ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'On-Site Visit'), ISBLANK(Client_Summary__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Client Summary field must be populated with the list of Onsite meeting attendees.
